text: Hi, does anyone know how we can add here a custom Arial Font for outgoing emails?

Consider not worrying about this. Even if you are able to set Arial as the default font, it won’t load on Android phones or iPhones which is likely to be a significant portion of your database. And the platforms where it _could_ load are going to load the default sans-serif font instead. Which in some instances might be Arial, but even when it’s not, it’s practically an Arial look-alike to most users.
